Package in.co.rays.Proj4.util

Class DataValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.Proj4.util.DataValidator
  • public class DataValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    The DataValidator class provides utility methods to validate various types of user input such as null checks, email format, phone number, password rules, and more.
